segments.text: I'm still observing the adult woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus remains solely on the plate she is drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredibly frustrating to watch her complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to pour over the sink's edge, creating a substantial puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is clearly in that puddle, yet she shows no reaction whatsoever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, as if nothing is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly makes me angry that she is so oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic setting is typically meant to be safe and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene, however, feels fraught with potential accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don't understand how one could be so utterly disengaged from their surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation seems almost designed for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would alert her to the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are also completely unsupervised in their cookie quest.
segments.speaker: PAR
